Firefox ### Which device do you use? The cookie banner is unblocked in `https://radiocaroline.co.uk/` 2. Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://a2zapk.io/1396534-wps-office-pdf-word-sheet-18-24-b1553-premium-mod-extra-a2z.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa2zapk.io%2F1396534-wps-office-pdf-word-sheet-18-24-b1553-premium-mod-extra-a2z.html) ### Comment > Weird loop and redirection to same page ``` Username: @techIndia-hacker ``` ### Screenshots

Block trackers,

Hide your search queries

**Tracking methods**:

Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `quic://unfiltered.adguard-dns.com`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base

AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy

Annoyances:
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,

AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
Adblock Warning Removal List Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js`
`https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/disable-amp/1.0/disable-amp.meta.js` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.2&system_version=Android+16&browser=samsung+browser&filters=21.207.11.22.17.20.118.19.3.14.18.2&dns_servers=quic%3A%2F%2Funfiltered.adguard-dns.com&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js%252C%250Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fdisable-amp%252F1.0%252Fdisable-amp.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=true&dns.filters_enabled=false&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=false&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)
